hackathon-description-text: is the local version of the first ever
hackathon-requirements: All Hack for Change Baltimore submissions are due before 4pm Sunday, June 2, 2013.
hackathon-rules: You must attend Hack for Change Baltimore and submit a project that improves Baltimore or other communities.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: It's the award anyone can win! If your app or map or idea can do the most good, you can win $750 provided by Advertising.com.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Most Likely to Make a Difference

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: For the individual or team who best duplicates a civic app already in use by the fine people of Philadelphia, Advertising.com will provide a cash prize of $250.
The Sunlight Foundation will provide $250 to the person or group who does the best job of liberating data or otherwise improving government transparency at Hack for Change Baltimore.

hackathon-description-header: National Day of Civic Hacking Baltimore
